channel.title: Interface for text input
channel.description:
Does anybody know any 317 interface IDs that allow for text input?
For example there is the enter amount interface which supports integers. Are there any equivalents which support string input?
All help is appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: Interface for text input
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

I thought this too. I was misled by the fact that you can’t actually input characters other than numbers.

So maybe to rephrase, how would I allow for any character input?

Thank you for your previous help

Read full topic

item.title: Interface for text input
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“razorback, post:1, topic:420403”]Does anybody know any 317 interface IDs that allow for text input?

For example there is the enter amount interface which supports integers. Are there any equivalents which support string input?

All help is appreciated. Thank you.[/quote]

I believe it is sent as a string, which is then parsed into an integer.
